item.description:
Check out their website for details: Beacon Hill ArtWalk

I haven't gone to this before, but it sounds like a cool way to explore Beacon Hill. Sorry it's on the same day as the Wachusett hike.

And of course, food afterwards if people get hungry. Lots of places to eat here.

I would take the T to Charles/MGH to get there. Good luck with finding parking around Beacon Hill.
item.how_to_find_us: See profile pic & I'll email my cell #
item.name: Beacon Hill ArtWalk
